name: 霍弘毅
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
schedule: This semester we will review Basic Grammar Rules, Style, and Paragraphs and we will then put all the tools to work in constructing complete essays.
scorePolicy: 4 short essays of about 3 to 4 pages each, 1.5 spacing, Times New Roman 12 font, normal margins, on topics to be assigned. Each essay worth 25% of final grade. No mid-term or final exam.
materials:
1. Gordon, Karen Elizabeth. The Deluxe Transitive Vampire. New York: Pantheon. 1993.

2. Dr. Wall’s Guides to Grammar, Style, Paragraphs and Writing Complete Papers. Handout
